title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 April 2014 - XWiki
content:

11:33 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:48 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] Release of 5.4.4 done, you can now commit on stable-5.4.x  
11:51 <vmassol> thanks gdelhumeau  
11:58 <spu7nic> has joined #xwiki  
12:20 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: I let you announce the release on twitter  
12:20 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: doing it now  
12:20 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: could you push commons and rendering to mave, ce,tral  
12:20 <gdelhumeau> ?  
12:20 <gdelhumeau> thx vmassol  
12:21 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: ok  
12:21 <gdelhumeau> thx tmortagne :)  
12:21 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: missing link to RN on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/XWiki%20544%20Released  
12:22 <gdelhumeau> indeed, let me fix that  
12:22 <vmassol> tweet done  
12:26 <gdelhumeau> BFD today?  
12:26 <vmassol> has quit  
12:27 <gdelhumeau> I have made him affraid :)  
12:28 <tmortagne> looks like it :)  
12:28 <tmortagne> but it's not a BFD  
12:29 <tmortagne> since last days was a BFD  
12:29 <tmortagne> we are supposed to take another one  
12:29 <tmortagne> on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/XWikiDays  
12:33 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: looks like you forgot to set the release date in the release plan  
12:33 <gdelhumeau> as usal -\_-  
12:33 <tmortagne> I usually set the date when I start  
12:33 <tmortagne> when I create the page actually  
12:33 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: but I create the page some weeks before  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> to have the generated link to open issues on JIRA ;)  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> so it's easier to follow what happens  
12:34 <tmortagne> if it takes more time I update the date when it's done  
12:34 <gdelhumeau> yes, that is what I forget every time  
12:34 <tmortagne> having a date make it appear first in the livetable  
12:54 <gdelhumeau> has quit

13:43 <DarkKnightCZ1> has quit  
14:30 <tmortagne> is anyone able to build xwiki-commons-extension-api in 2.4.  
14:31 <tmortagne> in 5.4.4 tag  
14:31 <tmortagne> ?  
14:31 <tmortagne> I get a nullpointer in javac...  
14:31 <tmortagne> even the agent that has been used to do the release is not able to build it  
14:31 <tmortagne> does not make any sense  
14:47 <gdelhumeau> with java6 ?  
14:48 <tmortagne> yes  
14:49 <tmortagne> look at you skype

16:11 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: how can I use bootstrap outside flamingo?  
16:11 <gdelhumeau> I don't have do anything in this direction  
16:12 <gdelhumeau> But you can use webjars  
16:13 <mflorea> so someone wanting to use bootstrap right away in XWiki can't do it..  
16:14 <gdelhumeau> Maybe I can take the code that make boostrap fits in XWiki in an other project  
16:14 <mflorea> i.e. if you want to write an extension that uses bootstrap css  
16:16 <gdelhumeau> you can, using webjars  
16:17 <mflorea> can EM install webjars?  
16:17 <gdelhumeau> but some classes might not display well without some adaptations  
16:17 <gdelhumeau> Yes it can  
16:17 <mflorea> still, you need to write a maven module. You cannot do it from the wiki  
16:17 <gdelhumeau> this is what flamingo does for the bootstrap JS  
16:18 <gdelhumeau> yes, that is the limitation  
16:37 <tmortagne> has quit
